product.title: Final Forge
product.description: Defend your tower and protect the dwarf's treasure from marauding creatures in this roguelike tower defense game. Explore the region, collect resources and choose the right upgrades. But be careful, don't leave your fortress empty for too long.
product.history:
ABOUT THIS GAME Defend your tower with a magic hammer and search for resources around your fortress as quickly as possible. Build better defenses to protect yourself from attacks, create weapons and upgrades until you manage to destroy all your enemies or die trying in this tower defense with procedural generation of waves of enemies.
DEFEND YOUR TOWER Control your cannon, upgrade your forces and crafted weaponry to defend yourself from waves of procedurally generated enemies that will come to attack your tower. Don't let them steal the dwarf's treasure!
COLLECT RESOURCES Collect valuable resources around your fortress to enhance your defenses or recover from attacks. Be careful how much you can carry and your time, your enemies can attack you while exploring or destroy your tower while you are defenseless.
UPGRADE YOUR DEFENSE Create and upgrade armaments with the resources you can get, face several enemy marauding orders and improve your resource collection to survive until you can destroy all your enemies
RUN AWAY FROM ENEMIES Be careful during your resource gathering, you will only be able to run and back to your fortress and your enemies chase you to beat you, run to your fortress and protect yourself from enemies.
Destroy them all!

features.feature: Procedural generation, a new adventure every match
Find magical artifacts and get stronger with every match
Collect and manage resources from the surrounding area
Take control of the cannon and defend your tower from hordes of invaders
Be careful not to be attacked while exploring
Build and upgrade weapons through an upgrade tree

credit.person: Sunflyer (Danilo Aguiar, Denner Hall, Wesley Ferreira)
